products.title: Podium Blackout Midnight Roller Blind
products.description: This chic pattern will make a bold graphic statement thanks to its interplay of horizontal lines. Contrasting shades of grey give this streamlined print an intriguing depth and will add a sleek, masculine edge to your space. The podium midnight blackout roller blind is created from durable blackout fabric to help you maintain your peace and privacy in a swift and simple motion using the sidewinder chain.

products.title: Podium Blackout Midnight Electric Roller Blind
products.description: Upgrade to the podium midnight blackout electric roller blind and benefit from a host of convenient features. This blind boasts an eye-catching contemporary pattern in tones of grey that is sure to streamline the look of your space. The blackout fabric gives you excellent light control and completely shuts out exterior light at the touch of a button thanks to the exceptional electric design. Product id: db-erbx1953 fabric colour: midnight material: 100% polyester lining: white backing headrail: durable aluminium roller tube supported by white steel brackets - top, face or side fix control type: electric control battery powered energy saving rating: er3 - highest energy saving value - uv protection and effective thermal retention blackout: yes podium blackout midnight electric roller blind in grey.
